info.brief_description: Some Pokemon or Characters who lost in the tournaments were taken as slaves by the victors
info.description:
WARNING, STORIES HERE MAY CONTAIN EXTREME CONTENT, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED

In this after-battle wrap up, the story between slave and master is expanded on, day to day. The main difference between continuing this on the tournament storyboard and continuing these stories in this one, is the tournament boards were mainly for tournaments, and the society board had its limits. On this storyboard, the only limits are that killing/murder of any kind will not be tolerated. It is easy to make slaves appear disposable/dispensable, however doing it in that way will not be tolerated.

It is pretty much self explanatory, it should also be noted that these stories do not necessarily have to be factual to the characters themselves but can be fantastical in nature. As in lets say the owner of a slave does not want to have the reputation for doing what they do here reflected on their characters public/tournament profile, at the beginning of the story they can write the text, "Fantasy Only" From there on out, anything written has no actual reflection on their tournament fighters used, or the slaves in the story.

This story is intended to allow for more extreme domination not allowed in the Society or Tournament stories, any fetishes are allowed, however to enter this story, you must have posted at least one chapter to the Pokemon Tournament/Society stories.
info.pretty_title: Poke Tourny/You Vs Who Slavery Stories
